## AsyncCallOptions.log property

Log what to console

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
log: {
        beCalled?: boolean;
        localError?: boolean;
        remoteError?: boolean;
        sendLocalStack?: boolean;
        type?: 'basic' | 'pretty';
    } | boolean;
```
